bioconda.name: bioconductor-linnorm
bioconda.summary: Linear model and normality based normalization and transformation method (Linnorm)

biotools.summary: R package for the analysis of RNA-seq, scRNA-seq, ChIP-seq count data or any large-scale count data. It transforms such datasets for parametric tests. Also the following pipelines are implemented: 1. Cell subpopluation analysis and visualization using PCA clustering, 2. Differential expression analysis or differential peak detection using limma, 3. Highly variable gene discovery and visualization, 4. Gene correlation network analysis and visualization. 5. Hierarchical clustering and plotting.
